| HistoryText             = The Sons of [[Ivaldi (Earth-616)|Ivaldi]] lived in their [[Forge of the Sons of Ivaldi|their forge]] in [[Mount Bellows]], [[Nidavellir]], south to the [[Sunless Sea]],{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 21}} and in the Caves of [[Svartalfheim]].{{r|Loki Vol 2 1}}

After he cut [[Sif (Earth-616)|Sif]]'s golden locks, [[Loki Laufeyson (Earth-616)|Loki]] went to Svartalfheim, and in the Caves, asked the sons of Ivaldi to craft presents. Despite doubtful, due to the possibility for them to please the gods, they created a replacement for Sif's hair, the magical spear [[Gungnir]], and the enchanted collapsible ship [[Skidbladnir]]. Loki would then go to [[Eitri (Earth-616)|Eitri]] and [[Brokk (Earth-616)|Brokk]] to provoke them to craft worthier present, including [[Mjolnir]].{{r|Loki Vol 2 1}}
